title: Iranian women who need certificates to prove they are virgins
description: In Iran, many women face medical virginity tests before they marry, but some are now pushing back.

title: Eurovision UK host city: Turin's advice to song-contest organisers
description: UK cities hoping to host the song contest next year will be shortlisted later this week.

title: Picture of wild cat hunting flamingo wins award
description: A photo of a wild cat hunting flamingo wins the Nature TTL Photographer of the Year competition.

title: 'Italian pizza is better for sure' - Italians respond to Domino's pulling out of country
description: Italians share their views after fast food giant pulls out of the home of pizza.

title: The rise of repairing: Why more of us are trying to fix things

title: A new reality for women seeking an abortion in Texas
description: This is what happened when a woman considering an abortion walked into a crisis pregnancy centre.

title: Will Smeed hits The Hundred's first ever 100 - watch his best shots
description: Will Smeed makes history by becoming the first player to hit a century in The Hundred - watch the best shots from his blistering unbeaten 101 for Birmingham Phoenix against Southern Brave at Edgbaston.

title: Nick Robinson: Sunak insists he's the guy to put things right
description: The BBC's Nick Robinson reflects on the key takeaways from his interview with Rishi Sunak.

title: Can I refuse to work?

title: Thousands of beagles saved from drug trials in US
description: A rescue operation is under way to rehome the dogs from a breeding facility in Virginia.

title: Ryan Giggs' ex became slave to his demands, court hears

title: Energy crisis is on scale of pandemic - Martin Lewis
description: Government support needs to double to make up for the huge expected rise in bills, the consumer expert says.

title: Homes for Ukraine: Quarter of refugee sponsors do not want to carry on
description: Over 25% of Homes for Ukraine sponsors want to stop after the initial six months, ONS survey finds.

title: The Kite Runner: Broadway show first to adopt mask-only nights
description: The Kite Runner will host special performances for theatre-goers who need or want to wear masks.

description: The fast food giant's pandemic-related exit from Italy was celebrated by some social media users.

description: French officials say the whale's condition worsened as it was being moved from the Seine to the sea.

title: 'I'm borrowing £5,000 to pay my energy bills'

description: Residents tell the BBC about the problems as they receive emergency water supplies.

title: UK heatwave: Four-day extreme heat warning for parts of UK
description: The Met Office says temperatures will be below July's record highs - but this heatwave will last longer.

title: UK government argues MSPs do not have power to set up indyref2
description: UK ministers will argue in court that Holyrood cannot set up a referendum without Westminster backing.

title: World Cup 2022: Tournament set to start one day early with Qatar v Ecuador
description: The World Cup is set to start one day earlier than planned on Sunday, 20 November with hosts Qatar taking on Ecuador.

description: The author-illustrator's family said he "was much loved and will be deeply missed".

title: East Kent NHS Trust: Hospital apologises over baby death errors

title: Student loan interest rate capped at 6.3%
